title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Skills: Language Education Design Workshop Utilizing Video-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain the three core components of video-based learning (VBL): learning outcomes, instructional design, and video production principles
Participants can propose three or more systematic video utilization strategies applicable to language education (self-regulated learning, metacognitive facilitation, cognitive development)
Participants can design simple educational video concepts using generative AI in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
